channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Federal technology staffers resign rather than help Musk and DOGE
item.description: Twenty-one civil service employees have resigned from billionaire Trump adviser Elon Musk’s Department of Government Efficiency, saying they’re refusing to use their technical expertise to “dismantle critical public services.”

item.title: Supreme Court throws out Oklahoma inmate Richard Glossip’s murder conviction and death sentence
Nearly 40% of contracts canceled by Musk’s DOGE are expected to produce no savings
